name: Lotus Golem
description: The Lotus Golem is a large construct known for its resilience and agility, characterized by its unique features related to water and magic.
memorable: It can absorb spells, providing both defensive and offensive capabilities, while also regaining hit points.
goals: To serve its creator and support spellcasters in combat.
relations: Typically created and controlled by powerful spellcasters.
environment: Often found in places of magical significance or among spellcasters.
strengths: Immune to certain damage types and conditions, possesses strong spellcasting support abilities.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma limit its effectiveness in social interactions.
attacks: Can make two melee attacks with magical water strikes that deal significant damage combining bludgeoning and force damage.
most_powerful_ability: Arcane Pool allows it to absorb spell energy and cast spells without using spell slots.
senses: Has exceptional Perception with a +9 modifier, allowing it to notice subtle changes in its environment.
skills: Skilled in Athletics with a +6 modifier, showcasing its physical prowess.
additional_information: Can traverse water effortlessly due to the Water Walker ability.
Immune to spells that alter its form through the Immutable Form ability.
Regains hit points through its Arcane Absorption reaction.
Possesses Magic Resistance, giving it advantage on spell saving throws.
Has multiple damage immunities and resistances to enhance survivability.
spellcasting: Absorbs energy from nearby spellcasting and can cast spells using stored charge points.
